name: multi_conference_router
description: Full-year crypto conference routing optimizer. Input a list of conferences you plan to attend + your home city. Hermes calculates whether doing multi-stop trips saves money vs separate roundtrips, finds the optimal routing order, and gives per-conference booking windows. Best for crypto degens attending 3+ conferences per year. Supports all major conferences: TOKEN2049, ETHDenver, Consensus, Devcon, Solana Breakpoint, and more.

conferences.description: List of conference names or slugs (e.g. ['TOKEN2049 Singapore', 'ETHDenver', 'Devcon'])

origin.description: Your home city or airport (e.g. 'LAX', 'New York', 'London')
